name: ChatVIA
description: ChatVIA is an AI platform that enables users to create custom AI agents trained on their own data for providing instant, human-like support on websites and for businesses.
longDescription: ChatVIA is a user-friendly platform designed to let individuals and businesses build personalized AI chatbots that function like ChatGPT but are tailored with specific user-uploaded data. Its mission is to deliver 24/7 instant support to customers and teams, enhancing efficiency by incorporating business knowledge into AI responses. Users can upload various documents such as PDFs, Word files, spreadsheets, images, and videos, which the AI processes to answer queries accurately and contextually. The platform addresses the limitations of generic AI by using advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) technology to handle complex layouts and multi-modal content. It offers flexibility with multiple leading AI models, ensuring no vendor lock-in and allowing seamless switches. Overall, ChatVIA makes AI chatbot creation accessible without requiring coding skills, serving as a tool for customer service, internal knowledge bases, and more.
features: Users can upload documents to train custom AI agents on their own data, enabling personalized and accurate responses to queries.
Create embeddable chat widgets that can be instantly deployed on websites for real-time user interaction.
Choose from a variety of leading AI models including GPT, Claude, Gemini, Mistral, and more, with the option to switch models at any time without vendor lock-in.
Collaborate with team members by adding them to the platform and sharing AI agents for joint management and development.
Supports multiple file types such as PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, text files, images, videos, and HTML, with automatic processing.
Advanced RAG system understands complex document layouts, extracts data from tables, and processes images using OCR technology.
Multi-modal AI capabilities allow the models to analyze images, understand diagrams, and extract text from visual content.
Enterprise-grade data security ensures GDPR compliance, EU-based hosting, encrypted storage, and secure access controls.
No coding is required to set up, customize, or deploy AI agents, making it accessible for non-technical users.
Custom branding options let users personalize AI agents with names, personalities, logos, and even white-label them with custom domains.
Scalable plans from free to Pro offer varying limits on messages, pages, links, agents, and members to suit different user needs.
Free custom integrations are available in the Pro plan to connect AI agents with other tools and systems.

faqs.question: What file types does ChatVIA support for training AI agents?
faqs.answer: ChatVIA currently supports PDFs and Word documents, with ongoing development for over 44 additional types including Excel, PowerPoint, images, and videos. The platform automatically processes uploaded files to train the AI.

faqs.question: Which AI models are available on ChatVIA?
faqs.answer: ChatVIA offers multiple models such as GPT, Claude, Gemini, Mistral, Cohere, Meta LLaMA, Qwen, DeepSeek, Grok, Nova, and Microsoft. Users can switch between models anytime without restrictions.

faqs.question: Is my data private and secure on ChatVIA?
faqs.answer: Yes, ChatVIA is GDPR compliant, hosted in the EU, and uses encrypted storage with secure access controls. The RAG technology ensures data remains private and is not used to train external models.

faqs.question: Can I customize the AI agent's appearance and behavior?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, you can customize the agent's name, personality, branding, logos, and even white-label it with your own domain. This allows for a seamless integration that matches your brand.

faqs.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faqs.answer: ChatVIA accepts major credit cards and PayPal through secure Stripe processing. No credit card is required to start with the free plan.

faqs.question: Does ChatVIA support team collaboration?
faqs.answer: Yes, team collaboration is included in all plans, allowing you to invite members and share AI agents for collaborative editing and management.

faqs.question: How do I embed the AI chatbot on my website?
faqs.answer: After creating your AI agent, ChatVIA provides an embeddable widget code that you can easily add to your website for instant deployment.

faqs.question: What are the limitations of the free plan?
faqs.answer: The free plan offers access to fast models, 100 messages per month, 50 pages, 50 links, 1 AI agent, and 1 member. It's ideal for testing and small-scale use.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time directly from your account settings.

faqs.question: Does ChatVIA require coding skills?
faqs.answer: No, ChatVIA is designed for ease of use, allowing anyone to create and deploy AI agents without any programming knowledge.
